EliiMar 8th, 2020


★★★★★
★★★★★


I was highly satisfied with the help I received from Doreen. She was super friendly and made my purchase an enjoyable experience. She went up and beyond to meet my purchasing needs. Especially since I was shopping for a gift, I ended up purchasing items for myself as well. I would definitely come back to this location just for Doreen. She truly cares about her customers and that is a rarity now a days. 


Janet OMar 4th, 2020


★★★★★
★★★★★


The sales representative was very helpful with selection.The additional sales rep also helped with color and selection of items.The store was meticulously clean, glass counters sparkled. This increasing the beauty of the metals and stones.


happyMar 1st, 2020


★★★★★
★★★★★


the sales  was highly attentive and able to help me pick the merchandise that i want. 


BrunnaVFeb 8th, 2020


★★★★★
★★★★★


Our sales associate was amazing! She did an amazing job taking care of us and showing us products that we’d be interested and went out of her way to do so!


Osito07Feb 5th, 2020


★★★★★
★★★★★


Love it

Hi my name is Shirley and the reason I am not satisfied as a purchased a cute little ring on March 16 and today is March 20 and already three of the little stones have fallen out not a happy camper

I was immediately greeted.  It was busy but the sales lady occasionally would give me eye contact and assure me she was aware I was waiting.

The store had a few customers but even when two sales ladies where free it took like 5 min. to ask me if I'd been attended. I think was kind of rude. My previous experience was highly satisfied.
